entry.name: keydown
entry.title: .keydown()
entry.desc: Bind an event handler to the "keydown" event, or trigger that event on an element.

argument.name: handler
argument.desc: A function to execute each time the event is triggered.

argument.name: eventData
argument.desc: An object containing data that will be passed to the event handler.

argument.name: handler
argument.desc: A function to execute each time the event is triggered.

div.p: Instead of .keydown( handler ) or .keydown( eventData, handler ), use .on( "keydown", handler ) or .on( "keydown", eventData, handler ), respectively.
